sentence.Network_en: He met each inquiry with an impassive countenance.
sentence.Network_cn: 他面无表情地接受每一个盘问。

sentence.Network_en: He was content to stand by as an impassive spectator.
sentence.Network_cn: 他满足于站在旁边做一个冷漠的旁观者.

sentence.Network_en: Her face remained impassive, studying the Belgian as he completed the form.
sentence.Network_cn: 她不动声色, 仔细观察正在填写表格的那个比利时人.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... passive a 消极的，被动的 impassive a 冷漠的 impassioned a 充满激情的.
越前樱乃_百度百科 ... hope- 希望 impassive- 冷淡的 jealous- 嫉妒.
英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... impartial 公平的 impassive 无动于衷的 impeccable 无瑕疵的.
张红岩TOEFL ... impassioned adj. 热烈的 impassive adj. 无感情的 impatient adj. 不耐烦的.

list.abs: 英语词汇的奥秘 ... immovable 不可移动的 impassable 不能通行的 immortal 不朽的，不死的.
英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... passport n 护照 impasse n 死路；僵局 impassable a 不可通行的.
英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... passport n 护照 impasse n 死路；僵局 impassable a 不可通行的.
passion 激情impassion 慷慨激昂dispassion 客观冷静

entry.tran: 喜怒不形于色的;不露感情的;面无表情的
entry.def: If someone is impassive or their face is impassive, they are not showing any emotion.

example.ex: He searched Hill's impassive face for some indication that he understood...
example.tran: 他盯着希尔毫无表情的面孔，寻找着表明他已明白的些许迹象。

example.ex: As the foreman of the jury announced the verdict, Miss Allan remained impassive.
example.tran: 陪审团主席宣布裁决时,艾伦小姐一直面无表情。

means.word_mean: 1. having or revealing little emotion or sensibility; not easily aroused or excited;

sentences.sentence: "he remained impassive, showing neither interest in nor concern for our plight"- Nordhoff & Hall
"a silent stolid creature who took it all as a matter of course"-Virginia Woolf
"her face showed nothing but stolid indifference"
"his face remained expressionless as the verdict was read"

auth_sentence.content: But tough, impassive adversarial processes are necessary.
auth_sentence.res_content: But tough, impassive adversarial processes are necessary.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But tough, impassive adversarial processes are necessary.

auth_sentence.content: His impassive expression, though, never changed.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: His impassive expression, though, never changed.

auth_sentence.content: The Danes look on with impassive surprise.
auth_sentence.res_content: The Danes look on with impassive surprise.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The Danes look on with impassive surprise.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. =pass through,表示"步,通过"; 2. =feeling,表示"感情"; 3. = 表示"忍耐,遭受"

stems_affixes.value_cn: 不能通行的,无路可通的
stems_affixes.word_buile: impasse[n.僵局,死路]+able能……的→adj.不能通行的,无路可通的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 慷慨激昂的,充满激情的
stems_affixes.word_buile: im进入+passion激情+ed有……的→有激情的
im无+pass感情+ive……的→没感情
pass感情+ive……的→感情用事→被动的
com共同+pass步,通过→共同能过的地方→做事的范围
im不+pass步,通过+e→通不过
pass步,通过→v.经过；通过；度过；传递 n.通行证；经过

stems_affixes.value_cn: 通过,经过;通路,走廊;[一]段落,[一]节
stems_affixes.word_buile: pass步,通过+age总称→n.通过,经过;通路,走廊;[一]段落,[一]节
pass步,通过+enger人→通过的人→乘客

stems_affixes.value_cn: 护照,达到某种目的的手段
stems_affixes.word_buile: pass步,通过+port港口→通过港口的凭证
com共同+passion感情→有共同的感情→同情

stems_affixes.value_cn: 热情,激情,爱好;激怒;强烈感情
stems_affixes.word_buile: pass感情+ion表名词→n.热情,激情,爱好;激怒;强烈感情
tres=trans越过+pass步,通过→横穿而过
en进入+compass范围→包围
pass步,通过→v.经过；通过；度过；传递 n.通行证；经过

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表示"向内,成为,进入,使……"; 2. 表示"不,无,非"

stems_affixes.word_buile: im向内,成为,进入,使……+passion激情+ed……的→adj.慷慨激昂的
im向内,成为,进入,使……+plic重叠+it→进入重叠→不直说→储蓄的
im不,无,非+moral道德的→adj.不道德的
im不,无,非+mortal死的→adj.不朽的
im不,无,非+mutable可变的→adj.不变的
im不,无,非+partial有偏见的→adj.公平的
im不,无,非+pass感情+ive……的→没感情
im不,无,非+pecc斑点+able……的→无斑点的
im不,无,非+polite礼貌的→adj.无礼的
im不,无,非+possible可能的→adj.不可能的
im向内,成为,进入,使……+migrate移居→入住
im向内,成为,进入,使……+pel推→推进,驱动
im向内,成为,进入,使……+peril危险→v.使处于危险中
im向内,成为,进入,使……+person人+ate表动词→进入别人→扮演别人
im向内,成为,进入,使……+prison监狱→v.监禁
im向内,成为,进入,使……+pulse跳动→内在推动→冲动

means.word_mean: 无动于衷的, 无表情的

sentences.en: A smile transformed her usually impassive face.
sentences.cn: 一下微笑让她平常没有表情的脸上煥发生气。

sentences.en: Her face remained impassive,studying the Belgian as he completed the form.
sentences.cn: 她不动声色,仔细观察正在填写表格的那个比利时人。

sentences.en: He was content to stand by as an impassive spectator.
sentences.cn: 他满足于站在旁边做一个冷漠的旁观者。

sentences.en: The defendant remained impassive as the judge sentenced him to death.
sentences.cn: 当法官宣布被告死刑时他始终毫无表情。
